title: Timpanogos Cave National Monument: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     September 30, 2015  Timpanogos Cave closing for winter 2015  Timpanogos Cave National Monument will close for the 2015 season - last day for tours October 11.   April 25, 2014  Timpanogos Cave open for tours May 10 with new online ticket sales, price increase  Visitors have been buying tickets to tour Timpanogos Cave for 92 years, and on May 5, they will finally be able to do it on-line.  Daily tours begin Saturday, May 10 and are expected to run through late September.   September 18, 2013  Timpanogos Cave closes for season, proposes slight increase in cave tour prices  Timpanogos Cave closes for season September 22, proposes slight increase in Cave Tour Prices to fund on-line ticket reservation system next year   May 08, 2013  Timpanogos Cave Open for Tours Saturday, May 25  Timpanogos Cave will kick off its 90th summer season Memorial day weekend, with the first cave tour of the year on Saturday, May 25, 2013. Tours will be offered until late September.   July 05, 2012  Quail Fire  The closure in American Fork Canon has been partially lifted, allowing access to Timpanogos Cave National Monument for cave tours. The visitor center and concessions will open at 7:00am with the first hike to the caves at 7:20am. Visitors who purchased tickets in advance for Friday, July 6, 2012 will have their tickets honored.   June 16, 2012  Timpanogos Cave National Monument Seeks Public Comment on Environmental Assessment  The purpose of this project is to improve visitor and employee safety along state route 92 and from rockfall and flood hazards. Provide for visitor enjoyment and education; and provide new efficient facilities for the Monument and PGRD.   May 16, 2012  Thanking America's Armed Forces  To show our appreciation for those who serve in the U.S. Military, on May 19 – Armed Forces Day – the National Park Service will begin issuing an annual pass offering free entrance to all 397 national parks for active duty military members and their dependents.   May 08, 2012  Opening Day 2012  Starting Saturday May 12, 2012 visitors should add a visit to Timpanogos Cave National Monument to their “must do” outdoor activities list for the season. The visitor center will be open daily from 7:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. through Labor Day, and from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. for the remainder of the season. Cave tour tickets may be purchased up to thirty days in advance starting May 12 by calling the visitor center at (801) 756-5238 and using a credit card.   January 31, 2012  Timpanogos Cave National Monument Revisits Alternatives for Environmental Assessment  The National Park Service (NPS) has reevaluated alternatives for the Environmental Assessment regarding the construction of a new visitor facility at the cave trailhead of Timpanogos Cave National Monument as well as the construction of an interagency center in conjunction with the Uinta-Wasatch-Cache National Forest Pleasant Grove Ranger District (PGRD) at the mouth of American Fork Canyon.   July 25, 2011  Timpanogos Cave Remains Open During Construction  Timpanogos Cave Remains Open During Construction   May 25, 2011  2011 Cave and Cave Trail Opening  Timpanogos Cave Open for Tours on Friday, May 27, 2011 Cave tour tickets may be purchased up to thirty days in advance starting May 27 by calling the visitor center at (801) 756-5238 and using a credit card.   March 31, 2011  2011 Season Delayed Opening  No abstract supplied.   September 14, 2009  National Public Lands Day and Cave Closing, 2009  Timpanogos Cave National Monument Celebrates National Public Lands Day on September 26, 2009 with free cave tours.  The caves and cave trail close for the season on October 19, 2009.   September 23, 2008  Timpanogos Cave Trail Reopens  Timpanogos Cave reopens cave trail   September 18, 2008  National Public Lands Day  Timpanogos Cave NM Celebrates National Public Lands Day with Free Cave Tours   August 28, 2008  Timpanogos Cave Trail Rehabilitation  Timpanogos Cave Trail Rehabilitation Work During Weekdays Caves and Cave Trail Open Weekends and Holidays   February 14, 2007  Denis Davis Named Superintendent of Timpanogos Cave  News Release for new superintendent   May 19, 2006  NPS Director Visits Timpanogos Cave  Fran Mainella becomes first NPS director to visit Timpanogos Cave
